cmf_server.CMF_INIT_COMMAND: cmf init minioS3 --url s3://dvc-art --endpoint-url http://${MINIO_IP}:9000 --access-key-id ${MINIO_USER} --secret-key ${MINIO_PASSWORD} --git-remote-url ${GIT_URL} --cmf-server-url http://${CMF_SERVER_IP}:8080 --neo4j-user ${NEO4J_USER} --neo4j-password ${NEO4J_PASSWORD} --neo4j-uri bolt://${NEO4J_SERVER_IP}:7687
